data.name: Online Savings Account (including Intro)
data.description: This high interest at-call savings account is designed to offer maximum flexibility with no monthly account or transaction fees.

eligibility.additionalInfo: All account owners have an Everyday Account or a Home Loan or a Credit Facility with Newcastle Permanent
This account is for personal use by individuals (no age restrictions apply) including for Trusts and Self-Managed Superannuation Funds (SMSF) with personal trustees.

fees.name: Real Time Gross Settlements (RTGS) - Outward Third party financial institution fee
Real Time Gross Settlements (RTGS) - Inward Third party financial institution fee
Real Time Gross Settlements (RTGS) - Inward NPBS fee
Real Time Gross Settlements (RTGS) - Outward NPBS fee

depositRates.additionalInfo: Credit interest you earn is worked out as tiered interest using the annual rate divided by 365 on the daily opening balance. It is paid to the account on the last day of each calendar month, provided all account owners have an Everyday Account or a Home Loan or a Credit Facility with Newcastle Permanent at the time interest is applied.

tiers.name: Entire Balance
tiers.additionalInfo: Credit interest you earn is worked out as tiered interest using the annual rate divided by 365 on the daily opening balance. It is paid to the account on the last day of each calendar month, provided all account owners have an Everyday Account or a Home Loan or a Credit Facility with Newcastle Permanent at the time interest is applied.

depositRates.additionalInfo: For accounts opened from 12 May 2020, a Fixed Introductory Bonus Rate will apply for 3 months after account opening on top of the current variable Standard Rate. This introductory offer is only available to new Online Savings Account holders who have not held an Online Savings Account with us during the last 6 months, and also have an Everyday Account, a Home Loan or a Credit Facility with us at the time interest is applied. At the end of the 3 month introductory period, the then current variable Standard Rate will apply to the Online Savings Account.

tiers.name: Entire Balance
tiers.additionalInfo: For accounts opened from 12 May 2020, a Fixed Introductory Bonus Rate will apply for 3 months after account opening on top of the current variable Standard Rate. This introductory offer is only available to new Online Savings Account holders who have not held an Online Savings Account with us during the last 6 months, and also have an Everyday Account, a Home Loan or a Credit Facility with us at the time interest is applied. At the end of the 3 month introductory period, the then current variable Standard Rate will apply to the Online Savings Account.
